products.title: Classic Pepperoni
products.description: A timeless favorite topped with pepperoni slices and gooey mozzarella cheese.

products.title: Margherita Delight
products.description: A simple yet delightful combination of tomatoes, fresh basil, and creamy mozzarella.

products.title: Hawaiian Paradise
products.description: Escape to a tropical paradise with this pizza featuring ham, pineapple, and cheese.

products.title: Supreme Feast
products.description: A pizza loaded with a feast of toppings, including pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, and olives.

products.title: BBQ Chicken
products.description: Grilled chicken, red onions, and tangy BBQ sauce make this pizza an irresistible treat.

products.title: Veggie Supreme
products.description: A vegetarian delight loaded with fresh veggies like mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, and olives.

products.title: Meat Lover's Dream
products.description: For the meat enthusiasts, this pizza boasts a combination of pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.

products.title: Mediterranean Delight
products.description: Experience the flavors of the Mediterranean with feta cheese, olives, tomatoes, and pesto sauce.

products.title: Four Cheese
products.description: Indulge in the richness of four cheeses - mozzarella, cheddar, gouda, and parmesan.

products.title: Spicy Diablo
products.description: A fiery pizza topped with spicy pepperoni, jalapenos, and red pepper flakes.

products.title: Chicken Alfredo
products.description: A creamy delight with grilled chicken, mushrooms, and Alfredo sauce.

products.title: Buffalo Chicken
products.description: For the spicy buffalo fans, this pizza combines buffalo chicken, blue cheese, and celery.

products.title: Pesto Garden
products.description: A garden-fresh pizza with pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, spinach, and artichokes.

products.title: Taco Fiesta
products.description: Taste the fiesta with taco-seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheddar cheese.

products.title: Mushroom Madness
products.description: Mushroom lovers rejoice! This pizza is packed with various mushrooms and truffle oil.
